vote.title: To recognize and celebrate Ms. Yvette Caslin for receiving the Community Sector Ripple of Hope Award
vote.description:
Title
 
To recognize and celebrate Ms. Yvette Caslin for receiving the Community Sector Ripple of Hope Award
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, IMPACT Community Action has prioritized the fight against poverty and has worked to address its root causes in Central Ohio for 16 years; and
 
WHEREAS, each year, IMPACT Community Action support individuals in our community by providing a range of services, including housing stability, utility assistance, emergency rental aid, workforce development training, and energy efficiency programs; and
 
WHEREAS, on Thursday, October 24, 2024, IMPACT Community Action will host the Annual Ripple of Hope Awards celebration at The Boat House to honor community leaders who are making a difference in the fight against poverty; and
 
WHEREAS, Ms. Yvette Caslin has been instrumental in promoting the Net Zero program in the American Addition neighborhood. Through her work, she has helped neighbors enhance home energy efficiency and built stronger connections; and
 
WHEREAS, Columbus City Council is proud to have community leaders who prioritize sustainable initiatives and provide continued community service to our residents; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and celebrate Ms. Yvette Caslin for receiving the Community Sector Ripple of Hope Award.
